titles: The tradesmans lamentation: or the mechanicks complaint.
author: Brokeman, J.
notes: Signed: By J. Brokeman, formerly a rich (but now decayed) tradesman.
Verse: "What learned doctor hath such skill profound ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Economic conditions --  17th century --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
